description:
As a result of the 1000 followers on twitter, i was asked if the community could be granted a discount on the current sales in this context. 

Of course it is possible, everyone who enters this award can get a discount of 20% on the current sales of the Cubeverse & IOTA CUBES - Mythic NFTs. After approval you will automatically get the discount credited when buying a NFT.

No new entry is necessary for future discount promotions.
name: Twitter 1000 Follower - Discount
